thread.title: 17th annual Taste of the Browns tackles hunger with Greater Cleveland Food Bank (video)
thread.title_full: 17th annual Taste of the Browns tackles hunger with Greater Cleveland Food Bank (video) | cleveland.com

author: Kristel Hartshorn, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: 17th annual Taste of the Browns tackles hunger with Greater Cleveland Food Bank (video)
text:
Kristel Hartshorn, Northeast Ohio Media Group CLEVELAND, Ohio -- The 17th annual Taste of the Browns benefiting the Greater Cleveland Food Bank was held at FirstEnergy Stadium tonight.
The fundraiser raised close to $200,000 at last year's event providing 45 million meals to families across Northeast Ohio. Every $1 raised allows the Food Bank to provide 4 meals to those in need. Along with supporting the cause, guests could sample food from more than 25 of the region's finest restaurants and chefs. They could also mingle with their favorite Cleveland Browns players.
Hear how Greater Cleveland Food Bank president and CEO, Kristin Warzocha and Cleveland Browns alumni, Dick Ambrose have joined forces to tackle hunger.
